# Weekly Introduction

  • Workflow and version control are fundamental concepts that programmers of all levels are exposed to. This week uou will focus on the modern workflow that will be used for the rest of the course.

# Practical Outcomes

  • You will be making our first version controlled website (a CV) using a professional workflow
